product.title: Tapatalk
product.description: Tapatalk mobile app plugin for vb4.

code.installcode:
$vbulletin->db->query(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_users ( userid int(10) NOT NULL, announcement smallint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', pm smallint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', subscribe smallint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', updated timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (userid) ) ");
$vbulletin->db->query(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push ( userid INT( 10 ) NOT NULL , type VARCHAR( 10 ) NOT NULL , id INT( 10 ) NOT NULL , subid INT( 10 ), title VARCHAR( 250 ) NOT NULL , author VARCHAR( 100 ) NOT NULL , dateline INT( 10 ) NOT NULL, status TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ) ");
code.uninstallcode: $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_users"); $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push");
$db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_users"); $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push");

code.installcode: $vbulletin->db->query(" ALTER TABLE " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push CHANGE `id` `id` VARCHAR( 100 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE `subid` `subid` VARCHAR( 100 ) NULL DEFAULT '0' ");
code.uninstallcode: $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_users"); $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push");

code.installcode: $vbulletin->db->query(" ALTER TABLE " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push ADD `pushid` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT FIRST , ADD PRIMARY KEY ( `pushid` ), ADD INDEX ( `userid` ) , ADD INDEX ( `dateline` ) ");
code.uninstallcode: $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_users"); $db->query_write("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "tapatalk_push");

plugin.title: Admin Promotion
Tapatalk: Options Format Transform
On Tapatalk Icon
Tapatalk: Display Via Tapatalk on Online page for users on Tapatalk App
Tapatalk Stop Forum Spam Integration
Tapatalk: Tapatalk Image Link

phrasetype.name: Scheduled Tasks
phrasetype.phrase: Clean up outdated alerts for Tapatalk users.
Tapatalk Alerts Clean Up

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase: Your email is marked as spam.
You do not have permission to access this forum.

You have entered an invalid username or password. Please enter the correct details and try again. Don't forget that the password is case sensitive. You have used {1}s out of 5 login attempts. After all 5 have been used, you will be unable to login for 15 minutes
You have entered an invalid username or password.

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: This option enables you to specify user groups to be excluded from being served advertising. Each user group name should be separated by a comma, for example, "3,11,6" which means only users who belong to groups 3,6 and 11 will not be shown ads.
Disable Ads for Group

Specify the amount of time you wish to retain push notification data that users can access. Note: longer times specified will require more storage to retain data and database performance may be affected as well.
Notification Table Clean-Up

Tapatalk will show a one-time welcome screen to mobile web users informing them to download and view your forum in the free app. This screen will contain your forum branding only along with a download button.
Mobile Welcome Screen

Mandatory. The Tapatalk API key allows us to verify the origin of push notification requests from your server. Please input the key provided in your forum owner account. This is will insure that push notifications like Private Messages and Subscription activity will be delivered to your members' mobile devices.
Tapatalk API Key
This field is required if you select "Redirect to External Registration URL" under "Registration Options". You do not need to include the forum root URL.
Registration URL
By enabling StopForumSpam integration, new user registration from Tapatalk app and/or from web will be screened with StopForumSpam database to prevent existing black-listed spammers.
Spam Prevention
Allow Hard-delete of posts and topics with Tapatalk.
Hard Delete

This setting is for advanced users. If you installed the Tapatalk plug-in into a custom folder by manually changing the name of the name of the default "mobiquo" folder, you must specify the custom folder name here. You will also need to specify the custom folder name AND path in your Tapatalk forum owner account as well. (http://tapatalk.com/landing.php)
Tapatalk Plug-In Directory
Optional. Choose the sub-forums you want to hide from Tapatalk.
Hide Sub-forums from Tapatalk
Prevent Tapatalk users from creating new topics in the selected sub-forums. This feature is useful for forums that require additional information or credentials that Tapatalk does not yet support.
Disable New Topics

Native Registration and Social Sign On (Recommended) - Facebook users can register for your forum using their Facebook credentials, and those not connected to Facebook can register for your forum via an in-app form.
Native Registration Only - No SSO available for Facebook users. All users must register for the forum via an in-app form.
Redirect to External Registration URL - All users registering for your forum will be redirected to a web browser outside of the app to continue registration.
Registration Options
You can assign users registered with Tapatalk to specific user groups(filling usergroup id). If you do not assign them to a specific group, they will be assigned a default group.
User Group Assignment
Enter your BYO App Product ID from Google Play, to be used on Android device
E.g. "Follow {your_forum_name} with {app_name} for [os_platform]". Do not change the [os_platform] tag as it is displayed dynamically based on user's device platform.
BYO App Banner Message
Enter your product ID in Apple App Store, to be used on iPhone device
Tapatalk will show a smart banner to mobile users, when your forum is viewed by a mobile web browser. The smart banner will contain two buttons: "Open in app" and "Install".
Mobile Smart Banner
BYO iOS App ID

Ability to match and replace thread content using PHP preg_replace function(http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-replace.php). E.g. "'pattern', 'replacement'" . You can define more than one replace rule on each line.
Thread Content Replacement(Advanced)
Enable this to support VBSEO like mode with Tapatalk. Disable this if VBSEO is not an installed add-on in your forum.
Support For Vbseo Like
Tapatalk Options
Tapatalk Build Your Own Options
Tapatalk In App Registration Options

setting.optioncode: radio:piped 14|2 weeks (on extremely busy forums) 30|1 month 90|3 months 365|1 year

setting.defaultvalue:
# For each sample blow, remove the '#' ahead to test # More infor: http://support.tapatalk.com/threads/advanced-plugin-usage.17106/
# Sample 1, replace all string 'abc' in post content to 'xyz' # '/abc/', 'xyz'
# Sample 2, replace [JAVA] BBCODE to [QUOTE] for better display in tapatalk # '/\[java\](.*?)\[\/java\]/si', '[quote]$1[/quote]'

setting.optioncode: <textarea name=\"setting[tp_app_banner_message]\" rows=\"8\" cols=\"40\" dir=\"ltr\" class=\"bginput\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"name="setting[tp_app_banner_message]"\">" . $vbulletin->options['tp_app_banner_message'] . "</textarea>
radio:piped 0|Native Registration and Social Sign On (Recommended) 1|Native Registration Only 2|Redirect to External Registration URL
radio:piped 1|Disable 2|Enable StopForumSpam in Tapatalk in-app registration 3|Enable StopForumSpam in web registration 4|Enable Both
